title: Bill Gates
summary: William Henry Gates III  (born October 28, 1955) is an American business magnate, software developer, investor, author, and philanthropist. He is a co-founder of Microsoft, along with his late childhood friend Paul Allen.[2][3] During his career at Microsoft, Gates held the positions of chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), president and chief software architect, while also being the largest individual shareholder until May 2014.[4] He is considered one of the best known entrepreneurs of the microcomputer revolution of the 1970s and 1980s.
